===Etymology===
[[西]] ([[western]]) + [[都]] ([[capital]])
: [[w:Chang'an|Chang'an]] was the capital during the [[w:Han Dynasty|Western Han Dynasty]]; [[w:Luoyang|Luoyang]] was the capital during the [[w:Han Dynasty|Eastern Han Dynasty]].
